source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a static, wide-angle scenery shot of a large, empty room. The camera remains completely still throughout the clip, capturing a motionless scene. The room is characterized by its stark black and white tiled floor, dark lower walls, and a distant arched doorway, all illuminated by a combination of a large ceiling light and smaller spotlights, casting a greenish hue over the space.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
